name: Bzpkszp
description:
A very short game made in less than 48 hours for the Bit Byte Jam #1. 
Uses a 3 color palette.
Has 3 possible endings based on your choices.

You control Bzpkszp, a Bzazuzazuan from planet BZ9340838. This planet has no natural gravity; instead, its gravity is artificially produced by a satellite. The satellite is monitored from a station on space. Bzpkszp works in that station along with three other crewmates: Eureka, Broco and Zaru. Bzpkszp's work is simple: watch some monitors and make sure the satellite is working all right. Sounds easy, right? Nothing could go wrong...right?

Created with Rpg Maker MV
